info.title: Stash Web Shop API
info.description: Server-side APIs for Stash web shop integration. This API set includes catalog management, purchase processing, and user management endpoints designed for server-to-server communication between game backends and Stash services.

get.description: Retrieves the complete product catalog including all purchasable items, offer chains, and non-purchasable display items organized in rows.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description:
Optional platform filter to get platform-specific catalog items

 - CATALOG_PLATFORM_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown platform

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Optional region filter using ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., 'US', 'EU', 'JP')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Optional language code filter using ISO 639-1 code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr', 'de')

parameters.name: playerId
parameters.description: Optional player ID filter to get player-specific catalog items

get.description: Retrieves an existing player by ID. Returns player information including profile data and in-game currency balance.

language.description: Player language preference using ISO 639-1 code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr', 'de')

inGameLevel.description: Player in-game level (must be positive, default 1)

inGameCurrency.description: Amount of in-game currency owned by player (must be non-negative, default 0)

post.description: Step 2B: Cancels a pending purchase that was previously registered. IMPORTANT: Always expects HTTP 200 OK response with inline error codes in the body.

status.title:
- PURCHASE_CANCELLATION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown cancellation error status
 - PURCHASE_CANCELLATION_STATUS_SUCCESS_CANCELLED: Cancellation was successful
 - PURCHASE_CANCELLATION_STATUS_FAILED_TRANSACTION_NOT_FOUND: Cancellation failed because transaction was not found
 - PURCHASE_CANCELLATION_STATUS_FAILED_ALREADY_COMPLETED: Cancellation failed because transaction was already completed
 - PURCHASE_CANCELLATION_STATUS_FAILED_ALREADY_CANCELLED: Cancellation failed because transaction was already cancelled

schema.description: Expected response format for the CancelPayment endpoint from the game backend (response body includes status indicating success or failure).
schema.title: Cancel Payment Response

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to cancel a pending purchase that was previously registered.

checkoutLinkId.description: Optional checkout link identifier if purchase was made through a checkout link

schema.description: Request to cancel a pending purchase that was previously registered.
schema.title: Cancel Payment Request

post.description: Step 2A: Confirms and completes a pending purchase that was previously registered. IMPORTANT: Expects HTTP error status (3xx, 4xx, 5xx) codes for failed purchases.

guid.description: The offer/product GUID that was registered (providing this OR product_id is required)

productId.description: The offer/product SKU that was registered (providing this OR guid is required)

items.description: Represents the result of a confirmed purchase
items.title: Confirm Payment Result

schema.description: Expected response format for the ConfirmPayment endpoint from the game backend (presence of results in response body indicates success).
schema.title: Confirm Payment Response

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request to confirm and complete a pending purchase that was previously registered.

checkoutLinkId.description: Optional checkout link identifier if purchase was made through a checkout link

tax.description: Tax amount in smallest currency unit (e.g. 99 for $0.99, can be 0)

total.description: Total purchase amount in smallest currency unit including tax (e.g. 1098 for $10.98)

timeMillis.description: Timestamp when the purchase was completed (milliseconds since Unix epoch)

guid.description: The offer/product GUID being purchased (can be auto-generated UUID v5 if not provided in catalog response)

quantity.description: Quantity purchased (must be positive)

cents.description: Price per item in smallest currency unit (e.g. 999 for $9.99)

metadata.description: Optional key-value pairs for additional item metadata

items.description: Represents a single item in the completed purchase
items.title: Purchased Item

items.description: List of items in this purchase

deviceId.description: Device identifier for tracking and fraud prevention (can be generated client-side)

source.description: Source of the purchase for analytics
source.title:
- PURCHASE_SOURCE_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown source
 - PURCHASE_SOURCE_CART: Purchase initiated from cart in webstore
 - PURCHASE_SOURCE_DIRECT: Purchase initiated from direct StashPay checkout link

ipAddress.description: Customer IP address for fraud prevention and compliance

region.description: Region/country code using ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 code (e.g., 'US', 'CA', 'GB')

emailMarketingOptIn.description: Optional flag indicating if customer opted in to email marketing

schema.description: Request to confirm and complete a pending purchase that was previously registered.
schema.title: Confirm Payment Request

post.description: Step 1: Registers a purchase intent with the game backend. The game backend is expected to reserve inventory for the purchase. IMPORTANT: Always expects HTTP 200 OK response with inline error codes in the body.

guid.description: The offer/product GUID that was registered (providing this OR product_id is required)

productId.description: The offer/product SKU that was registered (providing this OR guid is required)

status.title:
- PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown registration error status
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_SUCCESS_REGISTERED: Registration was successful
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INVALID_OFFER: Registration failed due to invalid offer
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INSUFFICIENT_INVENTORY: Registration failed due to insufficient inventory
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_PURCHASE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Registration failed due to purchase limit exceeded
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INVALID_PRICE: Registration failed due to invalid pricing
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_PURCHASE_LOCKED: Registration failed due to purchase being locked, e.g. in-app

message.description: Optional human-readable status message for debugging

items.description: Represents the status of a registered offer
items.title: Offer Status

 - PURCHASE_CANCELLATION_STATUS_FAILED_ALREADY_COMPLETED: Cancellation failed because transaction was already completed
 - PURCHASE_CANCELLATION_STATUS_FAILED_ALREADY_CANCELLED: Cancellation failed because transaction was already cancelled

v1PurchasePlatform.description: Represents the platform of the user making the purchase
v1PurchasePlatform.title: - PURCHASE_PLATFORM_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown platform

v1PurchaseRegistrationStatus.description: Represents the status of a purchase registration
v1PurchaseRegistrationStatus.title:
- PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown registration error status
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_SUCCESS_REGISTERED: Registration was successful
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INVALID_OFFER: Registration failed due to invalid offer
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INSUFFICIENT_INVENTORY: Registration failed due to insufficient inventory
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_PURCHASE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Registration failed due to purchase limit exceeded
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INVALID_PRICE: Registration failed due to invalid pricing
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_PURCHASE_LOCKED: Registration failed due to purchase being locked, e.g. in-app

v1PurchaseSource.description: Represents the source of the purchase for analytics
v1PurchaseSource.title:
- PURCHASE_SOURCE_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown source
 - PURCHASE_SOURCE_CART: Purchase initiated from cart in webstore
 - PURCHASE_SOURCE_DIRECT: Purchase initiated from direct StashPay checkout link

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for this purchase session

checkoutLinkId.description: Optional checkout link identifier if purchase was made through a checkout link

guid.description: The offer/product GUID being purchased (can be auto-generated UUID v5 if not provided in catalog response)

cents.description: Price in smallest currency unit (e.g. 999 for $9.99)

quantity.description: Quantity being purchased (must be positive, no bigint support)

metadata.description: Optional key-value pairs for additional item metadata

items.description: Represents a single item registration in a purchase
items.title: Purchase Registration

registrations.description: List of items to register for purchase

deviceId.description: Device identifier for tracking and fraud prevention (can be generated client-side)

source.description: Source of the purchase for analytics
source.title:
- PURCHASE_SOURCE_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown source
 - PURCHASE_SOURCE_CART: Purchase initiated from cart in webstore
 - PURCHASE_SOURCE_DIRECT: Purchase initiated from direct StashPay checkout link

ipAddress.description: Customer IP address for fraud prevention and compliance

region.description: Region/country code using ISO-3166-1 alpha-2 code (e.g., 'US', 'CA', 'GB')

v1RegisterPaymentRequest.description: Request to register a purchase intent with the game backend, at which point the game backend is expected to reserve the inventory for the purchase.
v1RegisterPaymentRequest.title: Register Payment Request

guid.description: The offer/product GUID that was registered (providing this OR product_id is required)

productId.description: The offer/product SKU that was registered (providing this OR guid is required)

status.title:
- PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default unknown registration error status
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_SUCCESS_REGISTERED: Registration was successful
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INVALID_OFFER: Registration failed due to invalid offer
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INSUFFICIENT_INVENTORY: Registration failed due to insufficient inventory
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_PURCHASE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Registration failed due to purchase limit exceeded
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_INVALID_PRICE: Registration failed due to invalid pricing
 - PURCHASE_REGISTRATION_STATUS_FAILED_PURCHASE_LOCKED: Registration failed due to purchase being locked, e.g. in-app

message.description: Optional human-readable status message for debugging

items.description: Represents the status of a registered offer
items.title: Offer Status

v1RegisterPaymentResponse.description: Expected response format for the RegisterPayment endpoint from the game backend (response body includes status indicating success or failure).
v1RegisterPaymentResponse.title: Register Payment Response

apiKey.description: API key authentication for server-side operations. Used for secure server-to-server communication between game backends and Stash services.
apiKey.name: X-Stash-Api-Key
